attributes.action: Provide free WiFi access in public areas throughout the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government took over 22 billion pounds when selling off licences to operate 3G. We propose that now is the time for the government to invest some of that money in providing free WiFi access in ALL towns & cities across the UK. The digital age is here. Communication is vital. This country needs this infrastructure to be readily available to all free of charge. This action will future proof all aspects of business within our country.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Provide free WiFi access in public areas throughout the United Kingdom."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15117.asp

Prime Minister's Office
